org.Spectrums

Class MXGFe

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.Spectrums.MXGF
      • org.Spectrums.MXGFe

  • public class MXGFe
extends MXGF
    An extension to MXGF with edge scores that score pair of consecutive aa along a peptides, can handle hi-mass accuracy data
    Author:
    Jian

      • Fields inherited from class org.Spectrums.MXGF
